author: gtully
msg: https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/AMQ-3310 - IOException PListStore "Could not locate data file" from FilePendingMessageCursor. Issue with reference counting and async location initialsation resulting in inuse data file removal and data file leaking. Pulled cleanup into task that periodically queries lists for references

author: sarowe
msg: fix typo; add vertical whitespace between sections

author: sarowe
msg: LUCENE-3081: Document Maven nightly builds, artifact generation, and using Maven to build Lucene/Solr

author: thorsten
msg: Fixing various bugs in the sitetreefragmentgenerator to get all mimetype and resource types. The problem was that if the language of the doc is not in the scope the generator always returned an empty mimetype.

msg: Added a SignedElements test for SAML.
